snippet: Kraft Foods is recalling 242,000 cases of its original flavor Macaroni & Cheese because some of the boxes contain small pieces of metal.
abstract: Kraft Foods will recall 242,000 cases of its original flavor Macaroni & Cheese after boxes were found to contain pieces of metal.
lead_paragraph: Kraft Foods is recalling 242,000 cases of its original flavor Macaroni & Cheese because some of the boxes contain small pieces of metal.

headline.main: Kraft Recalls Mac & Cheese After Metal Shards Are Found
headline.print_headline: Kraft Recalls Mac & Cheese After Metal Shards Are Found
